name: Overly Dramatic Leaf Blower Battle
description:
Leaf Blower Battle is an ultra-competitive leaf blowing simulation created for the fall season!

--------------------

Features:

  • Super intense leaf blowing simulations
  • Competitive scores
  • Realistic physics

--------------------

Controls (Controller only)

Left Stick - Move

--------------------

Credits:

Programming - Nathcra

Art - Nathcra

SFX - Sidearm Studios Ultimate SFX Pack

Music  - Sidearm Studios Ultimate Music Pack

Proudly Made with Godot Engine

--------------------

PC Requirements

OpenGL 3.0 compatible hardware

--------------------

Thank you for playing!
